channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- wildfly-core
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- wildfly-core

item.title: CVE-2019-14838|2024-08-05T00:26:39.125Z -- red%20hat -- wildfly-core
item.description: A flaw was found in wildfly-core before 7.2.5.GA. The Management users with Monitor, Auditor and Deployer Roles should not be allowed to modify the runtime state of the server

item.title: CVE-2018-10934|2024-08-05T07:54:36.087Z -- red%20hat -- wildfly-core
item.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability was found in the JBoss Management Console versions before 7.1.6.CR1, 7.1.6.GA. Users with roles that can create objects in the application can exploit this to attack other privileged users.
